docs.lead_paragraph: Can women with herpes have a natural birth? Can the herpes simplex virus (HSV) type 1 or 2 that causes genital herpes be dangerous for the newborn child? Those are among the questions posed by readers of the Consults blog in "5 Things to Know About Herpes."

headline.main: Is Herpes a Danger During Pregnancy?

docs.abstract: Genital herpes may be most dangerous late in pregnancy, says Dr. Peter Leone.
docs.snippet: Genital herpes may be most dangerous late in pregnancy, says Dr. Peter Leone.
